items.title: Grab this official Galaxy Watch Ultra Peakform Band for just $10 (Samsung used to charge $80 for these)
items.summary:
Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra Peakform Band

Buy for $10 (Reg. $55+)

What we love

I like the way Samsung does the sort of more sporty bands but still includes a buckle-style clasp on the back. While perhaps not the best for intensive cross-fit action, it does allow for a more sporty casual vibe without looking like you’re wearing the same band around town you went for a run in this morning. Best of all, it’s only $10 – no brainer here.

I am a big fan of the metal bracelet-style Apple Watch bands and regularly flip back and forth between one of those, a traditional leather strap, and some kind of sport band (the perfect wrist wardrobe trifecta if you ask me). The metal bands though – they can be very pricey sometimes and we just spotted one of the best prices on Spigen’s Modern Fit Titanium model at $70.

items.title: Travel up to 46.6 miles on the Find My-equipped Navee GT3 Max electric scooter down at $600, more from $495
items.summary:
Navee is currently offering its newer GT3 Max Dual Spring Shock Absorbers Electric Scooter at $599.99 shipped, matching its current Amazon pricing, too. In a rare turning of the tables, this model starts at a higher $730 price from Amazon, despite it carrying a $700 MSRP direct from the brand. While we have seen it go lower in the past, particularly during Black Friday sales, you’re still getting a solid $100 markdown here off the going rate, which lands it back at the best price we have tracked in 2026 and the second-best since Black Friday ended. You can also save a bit more while only losing some travel distance by going with Navee’s GT3 Pro Electric Scooter at $550 (down from $650 and matching at Amazon), or the standard GT3 Electric Scooter at $495 (down from $550 and beating Amazon by $99). Head below to learn more.

items.title: Canada's int'l merchandise trade deficit widens in 2025
items.summary: OTTAWA, Feb. 19 (Xinhua) -- Canada's annual merchandise trade deficit widened significantly to 31.3 billion Canadian dollars (about 22.8 billion U.S. dollars) in 2025, the largest deficit since 2020, Statistics Canada said Thursday. Read full story

items.title: You have 72 hours to save up to 57% on these four EcoFlow units, including the DELTA 3 Max power station at $749, more
items.summary:
As part of its continuing Home Backup Sale offers, EcoFlow has a 72-hour flash sale running that is seeing up to 57% discounts on two power station favorites and two add-on accessories (one of which fits the power stations). Many of these deals are returns from previous flash sales, like EcoFlow’s popular DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station at $749 shipped, beating its Amazon pricing by $20. While you may see a $1,499 MSRP adorning this model’s tag, it has peaked a few times up to $1,199 or more at Amazon over the last several months, with today’s deal knocking an additional $50 off the most readily available sale prices. While the price has gone lower to $699, that was only during Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales, making this the next-best price at $450 off the going rate (and $750 off the MSRP). Head below to check out the full lineup of flash deals while they last through February 21.

Today’s deal takes $65 off its usual going rate to land it $20 below the previous all-time it first hit during the fall Prime Day sale last year. We’ve seen the black variant of this mouse go for less, but the white one highlighted here has never been this low. It’s among the most compact and lightweight gaming mouse you can get your hands on right now, and it’s available at a particularly good price today.
